about_the_game:
• Explore the immersive world of Ükeron, with the freedom of non linear 2D platformer gameplay.

  • Improve your abilities and choose your combat style by customizing your attributes and gearing up with different items found through the land.

  • Fight punishing enemies, learn the best strategies to face each foe and tread carefully.

  • Reveal the story of the fall of Vardga's Kingdom, by putting together the pieces of its tragic collapse.

Will you endure the trials of this harsh journey, or will Ükeron bring you to your knees in ruins?

content_descriptors.notes: This game includes scenary objects like dead bodies and blood.

detailed_description:
• Explore the immersive world of Ükeron, with the freedom of non linear 2D platformer gameplay.

  • Improve your abilities and choose your combat style by customizing your attributes and gearing up with different items found through the land.

  • Fight punishing enemies, learn the best strategies to face each foe and tread carefully.

  • Reveal the story of the fall of Vardga's Kingdom, by putting together the pieces of its tragic collapse.

Will you endure the trials of this harsh journey, or will Ükeron bring you to your knees in ruins?
name: Greed Demo

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel Core 2 Quad 2.4Ghz
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Intel HD Graphics 4000
  • Storage: 560 MB available space

short_description: Explore the unforgiving world of Ükeron, reveal the story of its kings and warlords, carve your path through its dangerous environments, outlive your foes and grow more powerful with each strike of your sword.
